name: Slimelight (SlimelightDev)
description:
Slimelight is a third-person wave-based shooter where you play as a slime fighting other slimes.

The game is made by 1 programmer (Ryan Pallesen) and 1 artist (Samuel Bartlett)

Please fill out the feedback form!
